div.pre: 466 Gradiste, 35 km. SSE of Deva, Ru- mania, 1800-1806 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. or later (T) Contents: AV Lysimachus: st. ("several thousand") Disposition: dispersed Seidl, AfÃ–G 6 (1851), p. 241 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 48, no. 20 Possibly the same find as no. 467 below
